Legal_Issue: Whether the RPD erred in concluding India was a country of reference based solely on legal entitlement to citizenship
Evidence_Assessment: RPD ignored evidence of difficulties in obtaining citizenship recognition in India
Decision_Outcome: RPD found India as country of reference due to legal entitlement to citizenship
Burden_of_Proof: On claimant to demonstrate inability to access protection in country of nationality
Credibility_Factor: Dolma's fear of persecution in China and lack of effective citizenship recognition in India
Legal_Rule: Under IRPA, refugee protection is surrogate and only available if claimant cannot obtain protection in their country of nationality; 'control' test applies
Procedural_Issue: Failure to consider practical obstacles to acquiring citizenship
Grounds_for_Claim: Fear of persecution in China if returned from India
Outcome_on_Merits: Not determined – matter remanded for redetermination
Decision_Maker: Immigration and Refugee Board - Refugee Protection Division (IRB-RPD)
Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: RPD failed to conduct a complete and fair assessment of citizenship accessibility
Key_Evidence_Considered: Ethnic Tibetan identity, birth in India, lack of Indian citizenship documentation, risk upon return to China
Legal_Framework: IRPA, principles of surrogate protection, control test for citizenship acquisition
Applicant_Challenge: RPD decision based solely on theoretical entitlement without assessing practical access to citizenship
Court_Result: Application for judicial review granted, case remitted to a differently constituted RPD panel
Evidence_Type: Documentary evidence, personal testimony, country condition reports
Remedy_Requested: Quashing of RPD decision and remittal for reconsideration
Remedy_Sought: Redetermination by a differently constituted RPD panel
Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Risk of persecution in China due to ethnic and political identity
Applicable_Process: Refugee protection determination process under IRPA
Outcome_of_Review: Successful – decision set aside and remitted
Governing_Rule: The 'control' test for determining country of reference based on effective access to citizenship
